app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps Doot Messenger
app_description: Your privacy in your hand Free for you and your family Be Private. Speak freely Secret chat. Lock a chat window. Your data is stored on your device only. Device to Device Encryption superior than the traditional End to End Encryption. Dooth is the only messaging app that guarantees unprecedented privacy security and safety. Dooth cannot see view or hear your communications between you and your loved ones. Your communication passes thru Dooth servers and nothing is ever stored or used for online data businesses. Be yourself. No one can snoop or profile you! Dooth does not track or profile you for Ads. . Dooth is only for those who care for privacy security and safety of their family and friends. Keep the Dooth App in your device to keep Privacy in your hand! People are increasingly becoming conscious of their sensitive and personal data and do not want online companies to have access to it. Stop the abuse of your confidential and personal communications with your loved ones use Dooth. Your messaging e mail and social media contents are your personal business and no one else s including us. With Dooth you can be yourself and freely explore the online world as Dooth does not track profile or snoop you! Dooth Hack proof your Phone Number to prevent unauthorized registration on a different device. Dooth s DNA is built around Data Privacy Information Security and Personal Safety. Your online activities performed on Dooth such as emails messages calls social media shared documents pictures and other online activities are private encrypted and secure. Online activities performed on the Dooth Platform are private encrypted and secure. With Dooth: No tracking. No snooping. No profiling. No prying eyes. Dooth is based on the concept of a messenger a historical and oriental profession in India that existed in the medieval days to send and receive messages amongst the royals and the elites. The job of a messenger or a Dooth was to deliver a message without compromising its security let alone read its contents. The Dooth s sole responsibility was to convey the message or perish in the effort. This method ensured that there were no security breaches or invasions of privacy. Here are the highlights to some of our key features: Privacy No tracking no profiling no prying eyes no stalking Online personal behaviour is not tracked Personal and professional business is strictly confidential Data is a personal property Sensitive data is stored in one s country Security Device to device encryption more secure than end to end encryption No spoofing and tracking Prevent un authorised phone number registration Lock a chat when handing over the phone Chat app medias are not visible in the gallery Data is inaccessible if the phone is lost Personal Safety Last Message display lock Hack proof one s phone number to prevent un authorized registration Prevents socially unsafe news circulation Accidental video call lock information Other Features Timed messaging: Messages will automatically disappear from conversations when the timer you set for runs out Advanced settings for stories that provide you more customised security features Location sharing Easy on eyes Zoom a message
